price: Wͻn a wͻ’bͻ wͻn ho mmͻden wͻ Yεn ho no, nokorε sε Yε’bεkyerε wͻn Ya’kwan no. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn deε ampa sε Ɔka ayεmyεfoͻ anaasε apapafoͻ no ho.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna jāhadū fīnā lanahdiyannahum subulanā wa-inna al-laha lamaʿa al-muḥ'sinīna
